notReadyForCode: Not yet ready for code entry

education.body1: Next, please verify your phone number.
education.body2: Verifying makes it easier to send and receive with friends. You can also skip this step and return to it later.

learnMore.intro: Phone number verification works by associating your {{appName}} account with your phone number.
learnMore.section1Header: Do I need to complete this?
learnMore.section1Body: Verification is not required. However, without verifying, it is only possible to send and receive value using QR codes or addresses.
learnMore.section2Body: To protect your privacy, only an obfuscated version of your phone number is stored on the Celo blockchain.

loading.card1: To make sure your phone number is really yours, we're sending you three messages.
loading.card2: Once your number is confirmed, you can send and receive funds easily to your phone number.
loading.card3: Confirming also allows you to see which of your friends are on {{appName}}.
loading.card4: We require three confirmation messages to keep your account more secure.

skipModal.body1: Verifying allows others to send value to your phone number.
skipModal.body2: Without verification, you can still send payments, but only using account numbers or QR codes.

failModal.body1: An issue has occurred while verifying your phone number.
failModal.body2: You can skip verification for now and try again later.
failModal.body1InsufficientBalance: Your current balance is not high enough to complete the verification process.
failModal.body2InsufficientBalance: Please try again when you have added funds to your wallet.
failModal.body1SaltQuotaExceeded: Your phone number lookup quota is used up
failModal.body2SaltQuotaExceeded: Please try again when you have purchased more lookups
failModal.enterCodesBody: If you already received three codes via SMS, you can still enter them.

retryWithFornoModal.body1: An issue has occurred while verifying your phone number. We recommend trying again with Data Saver mode enabled.
retryWithFornoModal.body2: Data Saver mode allows you to communicate with the Celo Network more consistently using a trusted connection.

notification.title: Confirm Your Phone
notification.body: Receive payments directly to your phone number

quotaLookup.title: Lookup quota exceeded
quotaLookup.body1: To keep your phone number safe and private, {{appName}} limits how many phone numbers users can lookup.
quotaLookup.body2: You can purchase more lookups for a small fee.
